hands up.translation[0].definitions[0].d: with your arms straight up in the air – used especially to tell someone to do this as a sign that they will not attack you
hands up.translation[0].definitions[0].e: The men emerged from the building with their hands up.
hands up.translation[0].definitions[1].d: used to tell people to put their arm straight up in the air if they know the answer to a question or want to say something
hands up.translation[0].definitions[1].e: Hands up if you agree with what Eric was saying.
